oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Army discharge certificate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: U.S. Army discharge certificate issued to Pvt. James L. Witcher (aka Whitche) Co. F, 52nd Ky. Mtd. Inf., USA. Witcher entered the Army on September 11, 1863 and discharged January 18, 1865. Witcher was born in Macon County, Tennessee in 1844. His regiment served on anti-guerrlia duty and protected communications and public stores. They were involved in active operations against Confederate cavalry under Generals Forrest, Morgan, and Johnson throughout the summer of 1864 and into the spring of 1865.
